name: Georges Madness
description:
Time traveler from dystopian future and  you trying to prevent global catastrophe which leads to this kind of future. Seeking a way to close the portals that bring the corruption to the world.

Game Controls :
Keyboard key: `A`, `LEFT` : Move player to the left...
Keyboard key: `S`, `RIGHT` : Move player to the right...
Keyboard key: `W`, `UP`  : Jump, press twice to doulble jump...
Keyboard key: `SPACE`  : Toggle Light or Dark mode
